backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with user profiles, friend system, servers, channels, roles, messages, and state maps, including compare helpers and health check.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend source files and their responsibilities for the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the app shell with the profile overlay.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a collapsible channel category with text/voice channels and a button to open the create-channel dialog.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Modal dialog for creating a new channel category with backend action guarding and form handling.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels, handling form state and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input box enabling users to compose and send text messages with backend validation.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays channel header, message list, and composer while loading messages for the selected channel.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single chat message with author info, avatar, timestamp, and profile navigation.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Server discovery page with search filtering and join actions.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Card showing server details, member count, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Direct messages home view with fallback to friends tab and empty-state UI.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Displays friend info with avatar, actions, and a menu for profile or removal.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Friends management interface with tabs for online, all, pending, and adding friends.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Main desktop layout combining server rail, sidebar, content area, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Determines which main view to render based on navigation state, switching between home, discovery, server channels, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout wrapper that displays main content and slide-out sheets for servers, channels, and members.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Chooses between mobile and desktop shells based on window size and updates on resize.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Displays a scrollable server member list and allows selecting a member to view their profile.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Shows either the home DM menu or server channels and categories, with options to open server settings or create categories.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Top bar for mobile navigation with buttons for servers, channels, members, and user settings and dynamic title text.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Vertical server navigation rail with home button, ordered server list, and new server creation controls.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for creating a new user profile by entering a display name and submitting it.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Overlay or sheet showing a selected user's profile details, including avatar, banner, status, and badges.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Modal form for creating a server, handling name/description input, submission, and backend disable states.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Displays a server's icon image or a fallback initial if no icon URL exists.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog to create text or voice channels within a server, including category selection and API mutations.
Shows server categories and their channels and provides controls to create new channels within categories.
Server overview settings page allowing editing of description, icon/banner URLs, and community mode.
Lists roles and provides a dialog to create new roles with selectable permissions.
Main layout shell for server settings with a sidebar of pages and conditional rendering of each settings page.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Provides theme selection and text scale controls using settings and next-themes state.
Loads and edits user profile fields and username, saving changes via mutation hooks.
Wrapper for user settings UI with sidebar navigation and logout handling, switching between profile and appearance pages.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Displays backend connection status with loading, error, and retry actions.
Renders a static stage channel view with speakers, audience lists, and a raise-hand button.
Manages joining/leaving voice channels and shows participants with mute/deafen states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Returns whether backend actions should be disabled based on backend connection state.
Probes backend health via actor, exposing connection state, errors, and a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Hook that returns whether the viewport width is below a given breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Provides a logout function that clears identity state and resets React Query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, usernames, servers, and other app data with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base config defining theme variables, dark/light mode styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page UI allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity with error handling and loading feedback.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Navigation context managing active views, selected server/channel, UI panels, and related state setters.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Local storage utilities for tracking notification mute overrides per server or channel.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Settings context storing theme, UI preferences, and keybinds with persistence in local storage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
